spots.name: Zoe in Yellow
spots.description: The most famous backpacker party street in Chiang Mai! Multiple bars with cheap drinks (60 THB beers, 100 THB cocktails), loud music, and a young international crowd. Busiest on weekends.

spots.name: Warm Up Café
spots.description: Chiang Mai's most popular nightclub! Live bands early evening, then DJ sets until late. Great mix of locals and tourists. Cover charge on weekends (200 THB includes 1 drink).

spots.name: THC Rooftop Bar
spots.description: Chill rooftop bar with amazing views of Doi Suthep mountain. Perfect for sunset drinks. Good cocktails, relaxed vibe, and occasional live acoustic music. Happy hour 5-7pm.
